com.mpos.lottery.te.gamespec.game.support

类 GameInstanceServiceFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mpos.lottery.te.gamespec.game.support.GameInstanceServiceFactory

  • public class GameInstanceServiceFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage the implemnetation of GameInstanceService. A implementation of GameInstanceService should register itself to GameInstanceServiceFactory by call registerHandler. There is a base class com.mpos.lottery.te.gamespec.game.service.impl for implementation to inherit, it is a good start point.
